code: import React from"react";import Button from"@mui/material/Button";import Tooltip from"@mui/material/Tooltip";import Avatar from"../../shared/components/Avatar";import*as roomHandler from"../../realtimeCommunication/roomHandler";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ActiveRoomButton=_ref=>{let{creatorUsername,roomId,amountOfParticipants,isUserInRoom}=_ref;const handleJoinActiveRoom=()=>{if(amountOfParticipants<4){roomHandler.joinRoom(roomId);}};const activeRoomButtonDisabled=amountOfParticipants>3;const roomTitle=`Cretor: ${creatorUsername}.
